alert.note: Alert for Crowley County Including Ordway; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 2:38PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 231 AND 232... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 231 and 232. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County Including Ordway; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands
